Method Detail

beginImpersonation

public static void beginImpersonation(java.lang.String impersonatee,
                                      java.lang.String successUrl,
                                      java.lang.String failureUrl,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sessionAttributes)
                               throws oracle.security.idm.IMException,
                                      oracle.security.jps.JpsException
Starts an impersonation session for the logged in Fusion Apps user. All parameters are mandatory. IllegalArgumentException will be thrown If any parameter is missing or invalid. JboException will be thrown when invoked from within a proxy session or no ApplSession. It checks if the logged in user has "FND_IMPERSONATE_USER_PRIV" permission before starting impersonation.

Parameters:
impersonatee - User name of the user to impersonate. This has to be the user name with which the user logs into Fusion Apps.
successUrl - URL to redirect upon successful being impersonations.
failureUrl - URL to redirect upon successful being impersonations.
sessionAttributes - Attributes to be set in the proxy session.
Throws:
oracle.security.idm.IMException - Thrown by service provider incase of any issues
oracle.security.jps.JpsException - Thrown by service locator during lookup process

beginImpersonation

public static void beginImpersonation(java.lang.String impersonatee,
                                      java.lang.String successUrl,
                                      java.lang.String failureUrl)
                               throws oracle.security.idm.IMException,
                                      oracle.security.jps.JpsException
Starts an impersonation session for the logged in Fusion Apps user. All parameters are mandatory. IllegalArgumentException will be thrown If any parameter is missing or invalid. JboException will be thrown when invoked from within a proxy session or no ApplSession.

Parameters:
impersonatee - User name of the user to impersonate. This has to be the user name with which the user logs into Fusion Apps.
successUrl - URL to redirect upon successful being impersonations.
failureUrl - URL to redirect upon successful being impersonations.
Throws:
oracle.security.idm.IMException - Thrown by service provider incase of any issues
oracle.security.jps.JpsException - Thrown by service locator during lookup process

endImpersonation

public static void endImpersonation(java.lang.String returnUrl)
                             throws oracle.security.jps.JpsException
Ends an impersonation session of the logged in Fusion Apps user. All parameters are mandatory. IllegalArgumentException will be thrown If any parameter is missing or invalid. JboException will be thrown when invoked from within a non-proxy session or no ApplSession.

Parameters:
returnUrl - URL to redirect upon successful ending impersonation.
Throws:
oracle.security.jps.JpsException - Thrown by service locator during lookup process
